name: JACS365 HR Outsourcing Solutions
description: JACS365HR Consultancy, we understand the pivotal role talent plays in the success of any organisation. We focus on enhancing the SME’s. Established with a passion for connecting exceptional candidates with top-notch companies, we have emerged as a leading recruitment consultancy dedicated to shaping Job careers and driving business growth.
features: Work with KRA and KPI tool
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Recruitments refreshed
ShortDescription: The one-stop solution for Job Seekers and Businesses.
enhanced_description: JACS365 HR Outsourcing Solutions, established in 2021, operates as an HR consultancy specializing in recruitment and talent management. The service focuses on enhancing the success of Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) by connecting exceptional candidates with top-notch companies. It aims to be a one-stop solution for both job seekers and businesses, driving business growth through refreshed recruitment processes.
key_use_cases: Performance objective setting and tracking using KRA and KPI tools
General talent acquisition and candidate placement
competitive_advantages: Structured performance management approach through KRA and KPI tools
Dedicated focus on Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs)
